entry.content:

  • Various bug fixes in timesheets
  • Hardening of plugin installation
  • Fixed iCal issues
  • Unit tests for latest bugs

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.0
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

Highlights

  • Leantime core was re-written to be compliant with Laravel (10.x)
  • Coding Style Enforcement using Laravel Pint
  • New onboarding flow for invited users
  • Significant performance improvements up to (70% increased throughput and reduced load times) due to cache and session improvements
  • Many many many bug fixes

(Large) Fixes

  • [Fix] Broken Leantime CLI was fixed and hardened
  • [Fix] Admin users were seeing all users on all projects even if not assigned.
  • [Fix] Login Issues due to Cookie Secure Flag solved. (default is now false and can be set via config)
  • [Fix] Rewired configuration management to be more flexible
  • [Fix] Improved plugin installation and error management
  • [Fix] Fixed various security issues of un-escaped inputs
  • [Fix] Fix cron and email queue
  • Various others

Breaking Changes

  • Various event names have changed due to the new folder structure in core. Please check the documentation for updated event path tokens.
  • API Endpoints have not changed

New Contributors

  • @das-nagnag made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2742
  • @xdubx made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2747
  • @UnconsciousBlaringHuman made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2768

History from v3.2.1 to @

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.1
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

  • Fix for BASE_URL/APP_URL issue
  • Fix for configuration.php support (also now officially deprecated)
  • Fix for open basedir restriction issue on avatar creation
  • Fix for cache prefixes on cluster mode

History from v3.3.0 to @

Commits

  • b667cc56e [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.1
  • 9285883d0 Update StringableMacros.php
  • 138de0e81 update comments for phpstan
  • 671794ba6 mixin updates
  • ab23d1195 Adding comments for phpstan
  • 4eabdb19e Resolving open basedir restrictions with font files in avatar generation scripts
  • c4032e009 Version bump
  • 1875f07c9 code style fixes
  • 8ad64a64c Update .gitignore
  • 99357d001 Deprecate configuration.php file and create backward support
  • cbc8affd3 Ensure current project is selected for new sprints
  • 6da255a38 Fix debug calls in ldap service
  • e1f8943b7 code style fixes
  • 9aa3ffb1d code style fixes
  • ded3cac47 Fix constant url handling
  • 60ed1c16a Move BASE_URL set to config bootstrap to fix mixed url issue #2787
  • beccd6c1e Fixing cache pre-fix issues when using redis cluster
  • 93359df9f [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.0

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (16 commits)

Files

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes colliding file by @lizhineng in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2805
  • Synchronizing translation files with crowdin by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2782
  • Fixes issue where milestones without end dates are causing 500 error by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2808
  • Fixes wrong dates in milestone calendar header by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2799
  • Api Fix for authentication and new set of unit tests by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2811
  • Update Project Notification Event by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2813
  • Csv importer fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2814

New Contributors

  • @lizhineng made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2805

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.1...v3.3.2

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Info: The updater CLI command was fixed in this release. When updating a regular install please follow the instructions for a manual update (just replace the files with the ones in the release package)

  • Laravel auth service by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2823
  • Improved Avatar Handling by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2826
  • Fixing user role issue for manager by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2828
  • Fix missing value submission for notifications checkbox #2818 by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2827
  • Performance improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2829
  • Updated language file manager for plugins by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2832
  • CLI updates fixing updater and backupDb command by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2833
  • CSV validation improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2834

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.2...v3.3.3

Commits

  • b811bfa36 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.3
  • 752bfec26 Version Bump

  • 6828e9c04 Check for datetime parsing and sprint verification
  • 22d28a514 Fixes updater and backup creator
  • 87e377482 Updating how we load language files from plugins and caching them
  • 838c83679 Update bug_report.yml
  • 8b804d4ab Update UpdateLeantime.php
  • fd340969d Update Registration.php

  • 3a0aa4a4a fix code styles
  • ee7991394 Improving eventDispatcher findListener call and settings repo
  • 177d5143f Fix styles and ignore generated files in pint
  • 743beee87 Code style fixes
  • ad64371e7 Fix access issues regarding manager role #2820
  • 3619037a7 code style fix
  • 28343d36d Fix issue with api guard not having access to apikey
  • 120f57869 Fix missing value submission for notifications checkbox #2818
  • 29ad2e6bf Fixing code style
  • ee6285bd7 Add unit tests
  • 73af0b656 Create new avatar creator support class and ensure avatars can be generated in various languages and encodings
  • 936dcbf68 fix code styles
  • 4e2c859a8 Fix authcheck missing parameter
  • 5d18d8cc1 Using laravel auth and adding leantime as auth provider.
  • fabd4091d Check translations strings
  • d18f0c834 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.2

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (24 commits)
